blog.name: itstpool
blog.title: leroh
blog.description:
Сердцем не стареть, духом не падать.
rus/eng; she/her; pansexual.

summary: — Мне нравятся незаправленные кровати. Мне нравится этот момент, когда люди пьяны, и они плачут и не могут говорить ничего кроме...
body: — Мне нравятся незаправленные кровати. Мне нравится этот момент, когда люди пьяны, и они плачут и не могут говорить ничего кроме правды. Мне нравится этот взгляд человеческих глаз, когда они понимают, что влюблены. Мне нравится, как люди выглядят, когда они только-только проснулись и не осознают, что происходит вокруг. Мне нравится этот вдох, который люди делают, когда их любимый персонаж умирает. Мне нравится, когда люди закрывают глаза и витают где-то в облаках. Я постоянно влюбляюсь в людей и моменты их искренности. Я влюбляюсь в их срывы, и смазанный макияж, и фантазии. Искренность слишком прекрасна, чтобы облекать её в слова.

Мне нравится этот взгляд человеческих глаз, когда они понимают, что влюблены. Мне нравится, как люди выглядят, когда они только-только проснулись и не осознают, что происходит вокруг. Мне нравится этот вдох, который люди делают, когда их любимый персонаж умирает. Мне нравится, когда люди закрывают глаза и витают где-то в облаках. Я постоянно влюбляюсь в людей и моменты их искренности. Я влюбляюсь в их срывы, и смазанный макияж, и фантазии. Искренность слишком прекрасна, чтобы облекать её в слова.

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

London is a battleground of chaos just daring her occupants to try and survive. War is relentless and intolerable, forcing brothers to fight brothers in a gory mess that threatens the very livelihood of community; and not just those possessing the gift of magic are in danger. While some dance in puddles of plasma, others cower in dark corners waiting for it all to end. No matter which side you choose, loss is inevitable while Lord Voldemort fights for control. Sometimes, it takes more than protocol to put an end to unnecessary bloodshed. It is in the rebels that we find hope and torn morals giving just about everyone a sense of unrest. They always did say fighting fire with fire never worked; but maybe a small spark will help bring an end to the rivalry.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

title: Draco Malfoy: Headcanons!
body:
WhooooOOoo I haven’t posted any headcanons in bloody AGES so here I go-

- Draco having Veela blood in him is something that I absolutely love. I mean, look at him. Look at LUCIUS. That man looks like he preens himself for hours on end.

- I also like the idea of him having a French ancestor or something, but I’m not sure how that’ll work out since they marry into their family. I dunno.

- After the war, Draco went through a period of fucking hating himself for his views and choices that he had followed in the past. He told himself after a while that moping around and regretting the past was going to get him nowhere, so he decides to try and redeem himself (I’m still so fuckin pissed that J.K. Rowling didn’t give his a redemption arc bECAUSE HE DESERVED IT). He decides to take up Muggle studies and help half-bloods and Muggle-borns accept themselves into the wizard community.

- He goes to a Muggle tattoo parlour and tattoos over his dark mark to signify that he’s stepped away from that life.

- fUCKIN REDEEMS HIMSELF.

- Actively fights against Anti-Muggle-born views.

- He just wants to prove himself better than he was in the past. He just wants to be a better person. He knows that he was wrong in the past. He just wants to right himself.

- Honestly, he just supports any minority group (POC, LGBT, the disabled etc.)

- Fucking hell, he just wants to be a better person.

blog.name: iloveshippingkitty
blog.title: Forever Blowing Bubbles.
blog.description:
Hi There - This is Kat or Noct depending how you know me! She/Her pronouns, I like to be generally creative but writing is my love in life. I'm 23 in Yorkshire - UK. I'm an evergrowing open-book who's ironically working on a book. Feel free to send me a message about a prompt or an idea or if you simply want to talk.
(You can request for free despite the Kofi but if you do enjoy my work and can afford a spare cuppa with your request it's greatly appreciated) x

tags: bit of a set up chapter and acknowledgement of time and place but I still like it
plus second chapter is watching the Weasley's try deal with several hours of muggles while planes
i mean arthur and molly are married and i'm not gonna make them an unhappy married couple
but like it's not the main section of the story
do i want to just write about them nearly getting caught climbing pyramids and locking percy in a tomb?
(I need to make a link post for all my fics)
summary: The Gifts of Egypt - Chapter 1 - Nocturnal_Daydreams - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: The Gifts of Egypt - Chapter 1 - Nocturnal_Daydreams - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
So this is the start of my multi-chapter for a canon-compliant What Happens in Egypt before the start of Year 3 at Hogwarts. Plenty more to come but the thought of how much the Weasley’s bring attention to themselves in muggle places was too much to skip past.

Taglist; @gryffindor-dork , @accio-shitpost , @lilothequeen , @metyofanotherworld , @gerlockhell , @onmymamaibebreathin (I’m not sure if you wanted tagging or just wanted to find a fic but still) and @angelofgrace96

If you want on or off the taglist per chapter just give me a shout!

blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: Since no body has thought of this.   Imma check in with Voldy Moldy. How ya doing bud bud. Kill anybody recently? Been annoying...
question: Since no body has thought of this.   Imma check in with Voldy Moldy. How ya doing bud bud. Kill anybody recently? Been annoying Bella?
answer: Voldemort: Do not refer to me as “Voldy Moldy” or “bud bud”. Have some respect for your superiors. It is not your concern how many people I have killed recently and no, Bella has been annoying me.

reblog.comment: Voldemort: Do not refer to me as “Voldy Moldy” or “bud bud”. Have some respect for your superiors. It is not your concern how many people I have killed recently and no, Bella has been annoying me.

trail.content_raw: Voldemort: Do not refer to me as “Voldy Moldy” or “bud bud”. Have some respect for your superiors. It is not your concern how many people I have killed recently and no, Bella has been annoying me.

London is a battleground of chaos just daring her occupants to try and survive. War is relentless and intolerable, forcing brothers to fight brothers in a gory mess that threatens the very livelihood of community; and not just those possessing the gift of magic are in danger. While some dance in puddles of plasma, others cower in dark corners waiting for it all to end. No matter which side you choose, loss is inevitable while Lord Voldemort fights for control. Sometimes, it takes more than protocol to put an end to unnecessary bloodshed. It is in the rebels that we find hope and torn morals giving just about everyone a sense of unrest. They always did say fighting fire with fire never worked; but maybe a small spark will help bring an end to the rivalry.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

trail.content_raw:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: So Reg Barty what’s it like having your best friend also being your ex boyfriend?
question: So Reg Barty what’s it like having your best friend also being your ex boyfriend?
answer:
Regulus: It’s not the best situation, but there’s not much we can do about it. Things just sometimes get a bit awkward, but that’s understandable.

Barty: It’s hard. Mostly when I look at him it makes me feel sad, and I hope it won’t feel that way forever.

reblog.comment:

Barty: It’s hard. Mostly when I look at him it makes me feel sad, and I hope it won’t feel that way forever.
